bibl.idno: Papers of Jefferson Randolph Kean [manuscript] / Jefferson Randolph Kean, 1860-1950. MSS 628. The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

bibl.title: Letter from Kenzie W. Walker to Jefferson Randolph Kean, December 1, 1925

div1.p: Walker supplies the addresses of Mabel H. Lazear and Jennie Carroll. [Courtesy of The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia Library]

div1.head: Letter from Kenzie W. Walker to Jefferson Randolph Kean, December 1, 1925
div1.opener:
WAR DEPARTMENT
OFFICE OF CHIEF OF FINANCE
WASHINGTON, D.C.
December 1, 1926.
In reply refer to FEA 112.5/55846 (Finance)
Subject: Addresses of Mrs. Mabel H. Lazear and Mrs. Jennie Carroll.
To: Colonel J. R. Kean, U. S. Army, Retired,
Editor and Secretary-Treasurer, The Military Surgeon,
Army Medical Museum, 7th & B Sts., S. W.,
Washington, D. C.
div1.p:
Replying to your letter of November 23, 1926, you are advised that
the address of Mrs. Mabel H. Lazear, widow of Jesse W. Lazear, is 6 Oak Vale
Avenue, Berkeley, California, and that of Mrs. Jennie Carroll, widow of James
Carroll, is P. O. Box 2440, St. Petersburg, Florida.
div1.closer:
Kenzie W. Walker KENZIE W. WALKER
Major General,
Chief of Finance.
